name: Asteroid Frontier
description:
You got your own private planetoid - now you just need to stay alive! Pick up the green asteroid cores and deliver them to the refinery to keep life support systems running. Avoid getting hit by incoming asteroids.

Created in 72 hours for Survive The Game Jam 6 in Jan-Feb 2019.

The jam theme was "Gravity".

Instructions:

WASD + mouse: movement and camera control

Esc: pause game

M: toggle music

Credits:

Design, programming, modelling and music by Snebjørn Andersen

Software used:

Blender

GIMP

Unity

Makehuman

Bfxr

Reaper

3rd party assets:
